imdb.plot outline: After months of research and interviews with students, parents, teachers and experts, 40 cameras and a TV-gallery were installed in a Dutch high school to document the life of the students and teachers of the HAVO 4 class for six weeks. The series aims to make a 6 part documentary series that reveals what life is really like in a modern secondary school, and shows the importance of individual teachers and staff in keeping the students on the right track, ensuring they leave school with enough qualifications to take the next step in their lives.
imdb.title: De School
plot: After months of research and interviews with students, parents, teachers and experts, 40 cameras and a TV-gallery were installed in a Dutch high school to document the life of the students and teachers of the HAVO 4 class for six weeks. The series aims to make a 6 part documentary series that reveals what life is really like in a modern secondary school, and shows the importance of individual teachers and staff in keeping the students on the right track, ensuring they leave school with enough qualifications to take the next step in their lives.
